title: Best of Patreon: January 2022
description:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of January.
 
You'll hear clips about:
- Mysterious street art in Dallas that accuses the city's founders of being more than human;
- One couple's heinously exclusionary guest list for their wedding;
- What cryptid we'd make a documentary about; and
- A Bridezilla's 17-point list of demands for guests of her wedding.
 
If you like what you heard and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits and to subscribe today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
